question: Which among the following about Punch mark coin is/ are incorrect?
option1: Gold was the main material of the coins
option3: It gives an idea of the ancient economic condition of Odisha
explanation: The earliest coin of Odisha The Punch Mark coin is made of silver and copper with irregular shape and size. punch marks of sun, animals, birds, trees, human, geometrical designs were evident on this coin. It giver an idea about the ancient economy of Odisha.
